modName: Random Mod Title - Play as Deadmau5 in Skyrim - 15 different light up HD LED heads and MOAR
summary:
Gives you 15 different colored LD LIGHT UP Deadmau5 Helms in the game, none-replacer, craftable, droppable, and support for all races, genders, and followers. 

Now includes 3 outfits
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://blog.jakprints.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/Deadmau5-Logo.png[/img]
[color=red][size=7][b]DEADMAU5 SKYRIM HELMET MOD THINGIE[/size]

[size=4]The goal of this mod? None. Whatsoever. 
I think runnin around in Skyrim dressed as Deadmau5 is it\'s own reward.[/size]

[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/3502wd4.jpg[/img]


Suggest any and all ideas you have! Especially COLORS!! I love colors!
But if you don\'t like it, no need to be rude, gosh.

[size=5]UPDATE!!![/size] [size=4]Version 1.337 released! This is a pretty big update![/size]
- Added in FIVE more helmets, including a \'lore friendly\' metal helmet. Including a \"LORE FRIENDLY\" version mad of metal!
- Added in 3 Deadmau5 related outfits, so you can dress up as Deadmau5 himself!
- Added a pair of Deadmau5 Sneakers!
- Fixed shield texture - Now looks like blood, LORE FRIENDLY.

[size=5]UPDATE!!!(old)[/size] [size=4]Version 1 released! This a the first non-BETA release! 
Updates included;[/size]
- NO LONGER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD TO CRAFT! - This was a derp on my part! 
- Craft under IRON now not MISC - this is actually what was making it require dawnguard wtf
- New \'Vampire\' color, making for a total of TEN!
- New WIP shield! - Still looks funny, I would love to actually give the shield ears in a future update! 

[size=5]UPDATE!!!(old)[/size] [size=4]Version 0.9 released, this a is a full BETA and is only BETA until I am 100% sure it is glitch free! This is a total update from version 0.5 though! In fact, it\'s a totally seperate mod, you can have BOTH! 
Updates included;[/size]
- FIXED GROUND HAVOC ISSUE! You can drop the mau5 and decorate your homes with him! (thanks EmuXanadu)
- ADDED 5 MORE COLORS! - For a total of NINE! 
- ADDED HD LED TEXTURES - Looks like real LED lights!
- ADDED GLOWMAP! Some of them are a little bright, but OH WELL.
- TIDIED UP THE NIFS/DDS FILES. You may not care, but this should make this more space friendly!

[size=5]COLORS![/size]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-3-1365057580.jpg]Black & Pink & Blue[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-2-1365057579.jpg]Vampire[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-1-1365058030.jpg]Black & Red[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-4-1365057898.jpg]White & Pink[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-5-1365057580.jpg]Red[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-3-1365057898.jpg]Green[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-2-1365057898.jpg]Blue[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-1-1365057897.jpg]Purple[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-5-1365057899.jpg]Yellow[/url]
[url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33612-4-1365057580.jpg]Rainbow[/url]

[size=5]ISSUES:[/size]
[size=4]YUS THIS MAU5 HAS ISSUES.[/size]
[size=5]B] NECK PROBLEMS:[/size]
[size=4]SOLUTION = Just don\'t run around butt ass naked in it and you should be peachy.
Plus Deadmau5 don wanna see your dingalongs and taytays anyway.[/size]


[size=5]WIP:[/size]
Mau5 Hammer - a hammer with a Mau5 head on the end! Bash that troll the RIGHT wai!
Progress = 10%
light backwards - the lights light up backwards and the dark on the front is the lights on the back and the lights on the back show up on the front and I don\'t understand wtf is going on, but it\'s ignorable I suppose.
Progress = 0%
Rainbow Mau5 - Still included for now, but it\'s really funky looking, I want to fix it up! Just consider it a bonus WIP! 
Progress = 50%
GLOW FACE - I want to make the faces glow without the rest of the head thingie glowing 
(if you get my mod and figure it out, tell me what I\'m doing wrong, and I will add your name to the credit thingies!)
Progress = 50%
Winky/Angry face - the eyes do funny loopdie doos and I cant make them not look like methmau5 so this feature is totally left out for noa.
Progress = 25%
Suit thingie - I duno its some kind of suit thngie, maybe. Make me a tuxedo and I will love you.
progress = -65%
MAU5 SHIELD - Make the Mau5 shield more fun!
Progress - 65% (WIP still included in newest download!)

[u]Add the ability to play music, dance, and flashing lights![/u] - I\'m looking into a mod to add the ability to play music in game, and maybe even dance, and I know a mod exists that can make beams of light shine down on plants and stuff, I would like to have it so you can activate a power, multi-colored lights start flashing on your character from nowhere, s/he starts dancing, and your custom added music plays. (I think site rules stop me from uploading actual deadmau5 songs with my mod)
Progress = :(% 

[size=5]UNTIL THEN HOW R 2 B DJ?[/size]
Step 1] Download this mod right here silly! Grab your favorite flashy helmet thingie, then wear something funny! 
Step b] Download this mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31680 4 2 MK MUZX 
Step Gamma] Check the \'How to Add Your Own Music:\' section of that mod, then do what he says!
Step Quarto] Something
StepMAU5] add your favorite Deadmau5 to skyrim and fight dragons n stuff!

[size=5]LOCATIONS?[/size]
In the forge, under [u]IRON[/u] - BRING A LADLE!
hit ~ then type \"Help Mau5\" then type \"player.additem [mau5IDCode] 1\"
Remove the \"\" and replace the [mau5IDCode] with the ID code of the helmet or shield you want!



[size=7]SRS BSNS TIME:[/size]

[size=5]INSTALLATIONS:[/size]
To install drop the \"Data\" folder into your \"Skryim\" folder, merging it with your existing \"Data\" folder. If one is not there, this will create one for you, so don\'t worry.
Say yes if it asks you to merge folders. Should not replace any existing meshes/textures. Also, should not conflict with the first version of my mod.

[size=5]BACKWARDS INSTALLATIONS:[/size]
To uninstall just delete the \'Deadmau5helm\' folders in your textures/armor and meshes/armor folder, as well as the \'Deadmau5helms.esp\' in your Data folder.

[size=4]Credits:[/size]
ArtMurder - New textures, glowmaps, general tweaks and fixes, recolors, forge recipes, etc.
d0kefish - Original mesh.
EmuXanadu - Tweaked the ground mesh, giving it proper ground havoc.
[/b][/color][/center]
author: ArtMurder
